rmi

Class SiteAdministrationImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • rmi.SiteAdministrationImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, SiteAdministration

    public class SiteAdministrationImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements SiteAdministration
    Is the implementation of SiteAdministration contain a number which can be increment or decrement and provide the number of site on the same computer (rmiregistry)
    See Also:
